translations: [解剖] 咽喉的，喉部的；外咽的，在咽的

sentences.sentence: The gular diameter and inlet angle and outlet angle of the Venturis have an important influence upon hydrodynamic cavitation.
sentences.translation: 文丘里管的喉部直径、入口锥角和出口锥角对空化效应有着重要的影响。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion Health education can help patient with gular cancer operation to adapt new life style and increase the life quality.
sentences.translation: 结论：健康教育可帮助喉癌术后病人适应新生活，提高生活质量。

sentences.sentence: Micromachined gyroscope with electromagnetically levitated rotor (MGELR) is a new kind of an-gular rate sensor, which has the same working mechanism as traditional mechanical gyroscope.
sentences.translation: 电磁悬浮转子微陀螺（MGELR）是一种新型的角速率传感器，它和传统机械陀螺具有相同的工作机理。
